analyzed: vajrapāṇi nāma aṣṭottaraśata stotram
vajra sattva mahāsattva mahāyāna mahātmaka
mahāprabha mahāśuddha mahānātha namaḥ astu te
vajra rāja mahā vajra vajra sarva tathāgata
mahāsattva mahā vīrya mahā upāya namaḥ astu te
vajrarāga mahāśuddha sarvasaukhya mahā sukha
sukha agrya anādinidhana mahā kāma namaḥ astu te
mahā harṣa mahā āmoda su prāmodya namaḥ astu te
vajraratna mahā rāja sva abhiṣeka mahāmate
sarva ratna mahā śobha vibhūṣaṇa namaḥ astu te
vajra teja mahā teja vajra prabha mahā dyute
jinaprabha mahājvāla buddhaprabha namaḥ astu te
vajra ketu mahā ketu mahā dhvaja dhana prada
ākāśa keto mahā yaṣṭi tyāga dhvaja namaḥ astu te  /
vajra hāsa mahā hāsa mahā prīti pramodana
prītivega rati prīte dharma prīte namaḥ astu te
vajra dharma mahā dharma sarva dharma su śodhaka
buddha dharma su dharma agrya rāga dharma namaḥ astu te
vajra tīkṣṇa mahā kośa prajñā jñāna mahāmate
pāpa cheda mahā khaḍga buddha śastra namaḥ astu te
vajra hetu mahācakra buddhacakra mahā nidhe
sarva maṇḍala dharma agra dharma cakra namaḥ astu te  /
vajra bhāṣa mahā bhāṣa niṣprapañca mahā akṣara
anakṣara mahā jāpa buddha vāca namaḥ astu te  /
vajrakarma sukarma agrya mahākarma sukarma kṛt
guhya pūja mahā pūja buddha pūja namaḥ astu te
vajra rakṣa mahā varma kavaca agrya mahā dṛḍha
mahārakṣa mahā sāra buddha vīrya namaḥ astu te
vajrayakṣa mahā krodha sarva duṣṭa bhayānaka
sarva buddha mahā upāya agrayakṣa namaḥ astu te  /
mahāmuṣṭe samudra agrya vajramuṣṭe namaḥ astu te  /
vandyaḥ mānyaḥ ca pūjyaḥ ca satkartavyaḥ tathāgataiḥ
yasmāt anādinidhanam bodhi cittam tvam ucyase
tvām āsādya jināḥ sarve bodhisattvāḥ ca śauriṇaḥ
saṃbhūtāḥ saṃbhaviṣyanti buddha bodhyagra hetavaḥ
namaḥ te vajra sattvāya vajra ratnāya te namaḥ
namaḥ te vajra dharmāya namaḥ te vajra karmaṇe
tvām abhiṣṭutya nāma agraiḥ praṇamya ca su bhāvataḥ
yat puṇyam tena sarvaḥ hi buddha bodhim avāpnuyāt
idam uccārayet samyak nāma aṣṭaśatam uttamam
sakṛt vāram su bhakti sthaḥ sarva buddha tvam āpnuyāt
śrī vajrapāṇināma aṣṭottaraśata stotram samāptam
